goal: Create factory functions to convert manifest data into graph nodes
description: Add factory functions to the builder module that create ManifestNode, FileNode, ArtifactNode, and ModuleNode instances from raw data. Each factory generates unique IDs and populates node attributes appropriately.

contains.name: create_manifest_node
contains.description: Create a ManifestNode from manifest data dict and file path

contains.name: create_file_node
contains.description: Create a FileNode from a file path string with optional status

contains.name: create_artifact_node
contains.description: Create an ArtifactNode from artifact dict and file path

contains.name: create_module_node
contains.description: Create a ModuleNode from a file path string
